lines.text: What, you think... he shot a spell into the hole, and it came back out and hit 'im?
What? No, that's- that's not how that works.
It just makes a hole in stuff- it's not like, some kind of magic portal.
The magic portal spell is blue and orange, and needs to be cast on a flat white surface roughly two meters by one meter, and...
It doesn't look like anyone here is an Aperture Wizard, anyway.
Well, why bring it up, then?
I was just thinking out loud, man! I was about to say ''it probably wasn't that'' or something!
